extendedInfo.description: GIVE YOUR BRAIN ITS BIGGEST CHALLENGE YET!Cut the chains and observe the real rope physics! Test yourself with this FREE Gear/Cog based puzzle game with a twist! Piece together each level like a jigsaw, using all kinds of different mechanics. Complete with Gears, Cogs, Ropes and Chains, this game will have you and your friends wreck your brains. As you flow from one level to the next, donât forget to collect per level achievements and game trophies! The perfection achievement is enough to blow your mind! Drink water, stay sexy!Warning: Angry phone smashing will not be paid for.Note: Currently considered a BETA teaser, and feedback is much appreciated.

reviews.title: Gg
reviews.comment: Can someone please post a solution for level 24. It is driving me bonkers and there is no solution online anywhere! Good game less ads!
reviews.author: McGregor Gordon

reviews.title: Can\'t see small cogs when placing
reviews.comment: Suggestion: move the drag anchor point out of the cog, so the cog is not under the finger. Really frustrating in tight spaces.
reviews.author: Nikola \304\214eh

reviews.title: Way too many ads and too tiny
reviews.comment: After every game there is a popup that I click by accident. Also it\'s a bit too tiny for my phone.  Good idea otherwise.
reviews.author: Emily Reynolds

reviews.title: Grest puzzle
reviews.comment: Awsome puzzle game. Time killing. Wish there were more levels after 56th.
reviews.author: Rubens Rizzato

reviews.title: No.
reviews.comment: This game looks good but I haven\'t had the chance to play it as when I get to the first level it crashes and then, when I had tried it multiple times, I sent an error report off. No thankyou next time I see your game in the top 50 for GooglePlay.
reviews.author: Holly Kirby

reviews.title: Brilliant and very very addictive.
reviews.comment: A great problem solving excercise where the solution is not always obvious.  Sometimes frustrating but stick with it.  There is a great sense of acheivment when thise gears turn the right way.  Thoroughly enjoyable.
reviews.author: Andy Reeve

reviews.title: Good game in need of a couple tweaks
reviews.comment: This is a great game. Its well thought out and lots of fun. However, in order to receive a 5 star rating, there is one glaring issue that needs to be fixed. At the end of a level, that is, after you\'ve completed the objective, there needs to be a way to continue working on the level as you have it. The current implementation forces the user to start from scratch if they want to play the same level after completing it.  This makes  even attempting the perfection bonus drudgerous. Fix this issue for 5 *
reviews.author: Dan Brown

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The reset button needs to be moved away from the test button. So many times has it been pressed after you\'re about to complete a complex level! Fun game though.
reviews.author: Luke Brinkworth

reviews.title: not something I\'d pay for
reviews.comment: Looks like another dime-a-dozen puzzle game with decent physics, but one thing that is advertised is real rope/chain physics. The ropes and chains hang, but they do not move with the turning of the gears. If that is falsely advertised, what else is? fix this for more stars and probably more customers.
reviews.author: Zach Johnson

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Enough said! Great brain workout. The game has a few bugs, but nothing serious to stop me from playing.
reviews.author: Jenya Reay

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Great graphics. Good game idea. BUT ads before and after each level, horrible controls, and an apparently arbitrary scoring system.
reviews.author: Kerryn Greaves

reviews.title: THE EXIT BUTTON
reviews.comment: This game would get five stars if I hadn\'t restarted my game twice and completely exit out of the game three times because of the idiotic placement of the exit and restart button RIGHT UNDER THE START SWITCH!!! WTF?!?!
reviews.author: Terry G

reviews.title: 3 would be 5 but...
reviews.comment: Good game, but it\'s crashing almost every time I\'m playing. Please fix it, I\'ve reported a few crashes. I\'m starting to regret paying for this one...
reviews.author: Chris Seib

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Pretty easy, some hard ones, i couldnt see the timer, my fingers made it impossible to see where i was putting the small gears, gad to fingerbash the screen to get gears to move sometimes, but it made my brain work
reviews.author: Alex Geier

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.comment: Hopeless
reviews.author: Mohammed Saif Qureshi

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good game. But level 26 is driving me crazy someboby please tell me how to beat it
reviews.author: Joseph Merritt

reviews.comment: I loved this game....at least the concept but this version sucks I hated it uninstalling ASAP
reviews.author: stephanie arthur

reviews.title: Great game !
reviews.comment: Excellent work !
reviews.author: Vinod Chavda

reviews.title: Need more free levels
reviews.comment: Got to level 56, its a shame i now have to pay to go to the next levels.  Otherwise a good game
reviews.author: Stuart Glenn

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I have a question though. When will you have new levels. We\'ve been waiting forever. I have to force myself not to delete the game because I haven\'t played it in so long. I have to remind myself that there will be more levels coming. I\'m just very impatient when it comes to things I like. Great job on the game!!
reviews.author: Robert Charlton
